review: We love the firestick! We live in an area with sketchy cable and it has been a lifesaver. Well worth every penny!
author: Jan L. Bishop

review: A very different change of pace.  Excellent.  A wonderful story.

review: I dont like how I purchase movies to my kindle however its already reached its max capacity with only 4 movies... the fire stick is no good either.
author: Danny Guerrero

review: I am very happy with Fire TV. I like the remote, chromecast doesn't have that offered.

review: Works just as intended. Very happy with it.

review: Everything we want the fire stick has it, love it. Thanks
author: Amazon Customer

review: Stopped working a few days before warranty ended. Sent in a replacement request before warranty ended. Nobody got back to so I went back to see the status of my request and was informed warranty expired. Have three if these in my house. Won't be buying another Amazon product again.
author: Ron LaFountain
